pages.text: Golden books can be used instead of normal books for Enchanting in the $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$(/l). They are much more receptive, making the enchanting process both faster and cheaper.$(br)More than that, they can even be used to copy enchantments from Items in the item bowls around the enchanter onto itself, albeit for a hefty sum of XP.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)All is not gold that glitters.$(br)These books, however, they are.
